testcase.name: Validate the Tag Sheet Upload Feature in the AdTheorent UAT Platform
testcase.system-out: Given user opens browser....................................................passed Then user is on login page..................................................passed Then user logs into the website by entering "admin@adtheorent.com" and "AdTheorent155".passed Then validate the Dashboard page title......................................passed When user selects a campaign by entering the CampaignID in the Search text box.passed Then user lands on the Campaign Properties page.............................passed Then user expands the Creative Library panel................................passed Then user clicks on the Upload Tag Sheet button to navigate to the Upload Tag Sheet interface.passed And clicks on the Cancel button.............................................passed Then user is redirected to the Campaign Properties page.....................passed When user again clicks on the Upload Tag Sheet button.......................passed Then user again navigates to the Upload Tag Sheet interface.................passed When user clicks on the Submit button without uploading any file............passed Then user accepts the system-generated alert................................passed When user uploads the Tag sheet from the specified path.....................passed And clicks on the Submit button.............................................passed Then user lands on the Draft Creative List page after the file upload.......passed Then user logs out of the Draft Creative List page..........................passed
